total_subquestions_ys: Q1: Identify the pattern in the transformation of the input grid to the output grid in the examples.
Q2: Notice that the output grid is a 5x6 grid, regardless of the size of the input grid.
Q3: Identify the role of the number 2 in the input grid. It seems to act as a divider between the left and right parts of the grid.
Q4: Notice that the output grid is formed by the cells to the left and right of the number 2 in the input grid.

Q5: Identify the transformation rule for the cells in the output grid. It seems that cells with the number 7 in the input grid are transformed to 1 in the output grid, and cells with the number 0 in the input grid remain as 0 in the output grid.
Q6: Apply these observations and transformation rules to the input grid of the quiz to generate the output grid.
